Metadata.name: Signature Skills+ - Cadenza (Orpheus)
Metadata.author: rudiger__gb
Metadata.description:
Requires and must be placed ABOVE the "Compendium Restoration Pack" in Aemulus Package Manager!
Allows Orpheus to learn the signature skill "Cadenza" at level 37.
Restores 50% HP of party and increases hit/evasion rate.
Cost: 24 SP
